remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of lattice join of two atoms not under the fiducial hyperplane.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihjatcclem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjatcclem.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatcclem.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjatcclem.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatcclem.v $e |- V = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
dihjatcclem.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjatcclem.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatcclem.q $e |- ( ph -> ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatcclem2.c $e |- ( ph -> ( I ` V ) C_ ( ( I ` P ) .(+) ( I ` Q ) ) ) $.
dihjatcclem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = ( ( I ` P ) .(+) ( I ` Q ) ) ) $.
